title: SQLDROP INDEX Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLDROP INDEX Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
DROP INDEX
The
DROP INDEX
command is used to delete an 
index in a table.
MS Access:
DROP INDEX
index_name
ON
table_name
;
SQL Server:
DROP INDEX
table_name
.
index_name
;
DB2/Oracle:
DROP INDEX
index_name
;
MySQL:
ALTER TABLE
table_name
DROP INDEX
index_name
;

Reference

❯
★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code:
ALTER TABLE
table_name
DROP INDEX
index_name
;

summary: This tutorial covers SQLDROP INDEX Keyword concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQLDROP INDEX Keyword effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQLDROP INDEX Keyword and how to apply it in your projects.
